title: Sunny - Furnished 2.5 BED+2 BATH near Bike Path
posting_body: ['This is a bright, modern and very clean, fully furnished, South facing top floor apartment with balcony, right on bike path in Somerville near Cambridge-Davis Sq-Porter Sq.', 'Walking distance to bus, Davis& Porter T, BlueBike stations and the new Green line.', 'Located in the heart of beautiful Somerville, available to move in September 1st.', 'Washer& dryer in unit.', 'Fully equipped kitchen.', 'A/C. Very nice lively neighborhood which is peaceful at night.', 'Both bedrooms have nice big closets that literally fits all your 4 season clothing, one of the rooms have a big walk in closet.', 'There is another storage room which is not pictured but clean and spacious.', 'All rooms get plenty of sun, and the Office room have a skylight.', '3rd room is an Office room; doesnt have any closet space and is not intended for bedroom usage.', 'Utilities are around 150-160$. Snow removal is included so you dont need to do any shoveling!', 'Bike storage in the building.', 'Dedicated off street parking lot.', 'Every room including the en-suite bathroom has daylight.', 'All storage spaces including the hallway storage for shoes and coats have organizers set in them, so you literally need no more storage furniture.', 'You can walk to the vibrant Davis Square, grocery store and its red line station (2 stops to Harvard, 4 stops to MIT, 6 stops to downtown Boston).', 'It is easy access to route 2.', 'You will love this place!', 'Please contact me for your questions and to schedule a visit.', 'Notes:', 'No smoking building.', 'Minimum lease 8 months or more.', 'Available as unfurnished for long terms.', '•\tRent: $3600 for leases less than a year $3500 for 1 year', 'Utilities: around 150-160$ per month', '•\tBeds: 2', '•\tOffice: 1', '•\tBath: 2', '•\tAvailable move in date: September 1st', '•\tPet: Non-shedding hypoallergenic dog breeds are allowed.', '•\tParking:', 'Off street dedicated parking.']
